sub_title: Best-selling Writer | ‘Het Grote Depri Doe Boek’ and 'Hey Are You Okay?'| Illustrator | Publisher | creating hope, wisdom and optimistic change packed in pretty illustrations.
summary:
Hi there lovely reader. 
It's so nice to meet you, even though its through the internet.
I am Marieke. And I love to create. Draw. Illustrate. Write.

I always did, although there have been times in my life that I had forgotten all about it. 

But I am not willing to do that anymore. 

'Cause on my quest to awesome self care, following my dreams, and looking my demons in the eye - I accidentally became what I always wanted to be. I drew and wrote a book. And another one. And then some more illustrations went online. And now I work hard to work easy. It's my mission to be the best possible leader I can be to myself: with less work and more play (although this is a challenge, as my strictest boss ever appears to live inside my own head ;)

Through my books, cards, courses and whatever may be - I share my learnings along this journey to my self with others. With you. Cause the world will truly be a better place, if we'll learn to love living on it.

So here I am, so grateful to fill my daily life with the creation of books, courses, and uplifting illustrations. And I'll hope you will join me in this revolution of doing less, and seeing more. And above all, I hope you have a great day!

Love, Marieke

PS Curious? Check out www.depridoeboek.nl , or www.mariekelovestodraw.com (more coming on there soon :)

PS 2 I did have a previous life of being a manager of strategies, brands and sustainable missions. And even one of being an awesome adventurer who was never scared to quit her job and move to the other side of the world. All these stories are within me. And have led me to be the magical artist illustrator and writer I now am. 💖

treasury_media.title: Marieke Loves to Draw - Webshop
treasury_media.description: Marieke maakt van alles. Er is maar een regel: het is handgetekend en je wordt er blij van. Nu in de webshop: te gekke kerstkaarten EN de tweede druk van Het Grote Depri Doe-Boek (een handgetekend doe-boek voor de reis door burn out, depressie, angst...

treasury_media.title: Het Grote Depri Doe-Boek
treasury_media.description:
Het is zo geweldig om elke dag duizenden mensen te mogen helpen met dit boek. Het handgetekende boek dat ik oorspronkelijk voor mijzelf maakte, maar er nu is voor iedereen die op res id door burn out, depressie, angst... of hoe je die dikke dip ook noemt. Via deze link lees je meer (Enne vandaag voor 20.00 besteld = direct gratis met liefde verzonden 💌).

Liefs, Marieke

treasury_media.title: Het Grote Depri Doe-Boek
treasury_media.description: Een handgetekend doe-boek voor de reis door burn out, depressie, angst... of hoe je die dikke dip ook noemt. Ik maakte het voor mezelf, maar nu is het er ook voor jou!

treasury_media.title: Het Grote Depri Doe Boek - illustratrice Marieke vertelt erover
treasury_media.description:
Toen illustratrice Marieke helemaal was opgebloeid uit een nogal diepe dip, maakte ze een handgetekend doe-boek voor zichzelf. Met alle tips, verhalen en hulp die ECHT hadden geholpen. Nu is het er ook voor jou.

"Want er zijn zoveel boeken over depressie en burnout geschreven - maar ik kon toen helemaal niet lezen. Daarom is dit boek handgetekend. Dus hoe je dikke dip ook heet, we gaan je er stap voor stap uit loodsen. Want ik geloof in jou, ook als je dat zelf (nog) even niet kan.

education.field_of_study: Centre for Sustainability Leadership (CSL) - Fellowship 2014 - 6 months

profile_positions.description: Creating hope, wisdom and optimism for anyone that is craving a happier life, or frankly just is in deep sh*t right now. I create books, beautiful journals and wise card decks with a touch of humor. Next up: a sustainable post card range that really gives a *bleep*.
profile_positions.title: Founder, Illustrator, Publisher and Artist

profile_positions.description: Handillustrated bestselling book for kids going through a rough divorce of their parents. Full of love hope and recognition. Honoured to make and co-write this beautiful new book (‘you won’t have to do it alone’) - made in collaboration with NGO Villa Pinedo and A.W. Bruna publishers. In June 2021, it's the best-selling book for A.W. Bruna publishers (largest publisher in the Benelux).
profile_positions.title: Co-writer and Illustrator ‘Je hoeft het niet alleen te doen’  - best selling book for kids (10-16):

profile_positions.description: Hand-illustrated best selling book on how to get through anxiety, depression, burn-out... or whatever your breakdown is called. As a best friend in a book, I made this book for myself after blossoming again after a hectic period of anxiety - and currently thousands of people are working in it and blossoming once again. Raving reviews from professionals (MIND institute, Psychology Magazine e.a.) and readers alike (4.9 out of 5 score). Launched january 2020. 4rd print run coming up summer 2021. For more information, www.depridoeboek.nl
profile_positions.title: Writer, Illustrator and Publisher 'Het Grote Depri Doe Boek'

profile_positions.description:
“If you want to learn something, read about it. If you want to understand something, write about it. If you want to master something, teach it.” – Yogi Bhajan

1. Marketing workshop for small sustainable start ups
Next to my work as a marketing manager - I love creating workshops for (sustainable) start-ups on their (brand) strategy. To channel and focus their endless energy and passion into the structures, brand designs and growth plans that I have mastered in my career as a marketing manager.

2. Interim marketing manager Farm Brothers (july 2019 to sept 2020)
Eat cookies, change the earth! We are a young B-corp on a mission. To make the best organic cookies, while giving back to the earth. For each pack of cookies you buy, we save a cookie-sized piece of land and make it organic forever. So that we can keep on growing and harvesting for future generations. (Did you know our top soil is in danger due to extensive land use? Now you do. Eat cookies :)

3. Interim Marketing Manager OneWorld (may - july 2019)
Journalism for change! Helping OneWorld magazine to get clear about it's mission, values and marketing for the future: hoe to get more paid subscribers (friends).

4. Interim Marketing Manager 'The Food Line Up' (jan - april 2019)
How do you create next level marketing for this next level food experience agency? Making marketing-thinking leading in stead of lagging behind? Well - we start by mixing a gallon of analytic business mindset with a dash of creativity and spoonful of food-love. Yes we can.
profile_positions.title: Public speaker, entrepreneur and marketing expert for sustainable brands

profile_positions.description: What if I could combine my love for art and marketing? Yes we can in this maternity leave. The Vrije Academie is the largest Institute for education on art and culture in The Netherlands. It reaches out to over 100.000 people with courses, lectures and tours in more than 40 cities in the Netherlands. Next to art and art history there are courses in philosophy, history, psychology, photography, literature and much more! My work involved keeping the business running - with a focus on email, online and direct marketing / targeting.
profile_positions.title: Head of Marketing a.i.

profile_positions.description:
Crazy about Chocolate - Serious about People! Blessed to work for my favourite chocolate brand and team again - and help end slavery in the chocolate industry at the same time. 

nov 2016 / apr 2017 - International Sales Manager for Scandinavia, Belgium and Germany (maternity leave)
march 2016 / oct 2016 - Video storytelling strategy, creative merchandise and consumer (friends) research. oct 2015 / march 2016 - Product development (Limited Editions 2016)
profile_positions.title: Arty Choc (sr. marketing project manager)

profile_positions.description:
Working on (video)storytelling for change. My role as a lead creative for this social enterprise was twofold: creating strategy workshops and brand plans as well as producing video's, live event sketches, and custom illustrations myself. 

Clients included WWF, Centre for Social Impact, G8 Taskforce, Benevolent Society, Bendigo Bank, Westpac Bank, Microsoft Yammer, Climate Change Council, Sydney NSW council and many others. For more work you can check marieketheartist.tumblr.com and www.digitalstorytellers.com.au
profile_positions.title: Lead Creative / Strategist / Illustrator

profile_positions.description: Happy and grateful that I could use my marketing experience in this contract brand manager role (interim / parttime) back at Unilever :) Launching exciting Lipton innovation (Lipton Pyramids), managing Media-sponsorships and brand promotions. part time - 3 days a week
profile_positions.title: Sr. Brand Manager Lipton Tea

profile_positions.description: Can a business and a NGO stand together as activists? Asked by WWF to set up and manage a "Fight for the Reef" partnership with Ben and Jerry's. Combining WWF's expertise and issue knowledge with Ben and Jerry's business power and awareness amongst youngsters. Result was a "Fight for the Reef Scooptour" through all of Australia, custom radio campaign and great social media and PR coverage.
profile_positions.title: Partnership Project Manager

volunteer_experiences.description: How can we create a place where people WANT to work, a place of innovation and collaboration? Honoured to add creativity to the awesome co-working place HUB Sydney, as their artist in residence.
